title: [Large-scale] Quantitative Methodology Selection Strategy: Practical Assessment and Mixed-grade Application

context.prior_knowledge: Basic statistical concepts and understanding of social science research methodologies
context.additional_context: A social science research methodology education course for general citizens, requiring instructional design emphasizing smartphone-based accessibility

learning_goals: Learners can apply a decision-making framework considering factors such as assessment methods, credits, and grade composition when selecting quantitative methodology courses
Learners can perform quantitative analysis skills using practice-based assessment methods in a mixed-grade environment
Learners can simulate data collection and analysis processes using smartphone-based tools in a limited technological environment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
